text: The timepoint functionality is now available for use. In addition to the filter documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/list-filters-definitions|here>, you will find some examples <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1dfoZYge7KULNB2H3I8x1YYbGPx4n81FOXYpMGe9J3PI/edit#heading=h.jtr4ony3yo9h|here>
